short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Convert video books to PDF: Merge screenshots into a PDF file, download as ZIP. Ideal for compiling books from YouTube videos.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Main Features:

Video Books to PDF!!

1. Merge multiple screenshots into a single PDF file.
2. Download all screenshots as a compressed ZIP file.
3. Download all images of the current web page.

This extension is your ideal tool for generating a PDF file from screenshots of a website. Imagine wanting to compile a book from a YouTube book video. Simply install this Chrome extension, and you're all set.

Navigate to the website you wish to capture, select the region on the screen, and start capturing! After capturing, easily organize and rearrange your images through a user-friendly interface. With just a single click, a PDF file containing your selected images is generated.
